#include<iostream>
#include<unistd.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
  //  freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
   // freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    int t;
    int cap,men,women,children;

    int mtemp,wtemp,ctemp,adulttemp;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t)
    {
        scanf("%d %d %d %d",&cap,&men,&women,&children);

        wtemp=men*2;
        if(women<wtemp)wtemp=women;

        ctemp=(men+wtemp)*4;
        if((cap*0.8)<ctemp)ctemp=cap*0.8;
        if(children<ctemp)ctemp=children;
        adulttemp=cap-ctemp;

        if((men+wtemp)<adulttemp)adulttemp=men+wtemp;
        if(adulttemp*0.6666666667<wtemp)wtemp=adulttemp*0.6666666667;
        if(women<wtemp)wtemp=women;

        mtemp=adulttemp-wtemp;

        printf("%d %d %d\n",mtemp,wtemp,ctemp);
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
